update ClassSpaceEnc set ClassSpaceId = #{classspaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EncType = #{enctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EncName = #{encname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EncAddr = #{encaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EncImgAddr = #{encimgaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PublisherId = #{publisherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PublishDate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EncOrder = #{encorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TabId = #{tabid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ce.EncType,ce.EncName,ce.EncAddr,ce.EncImgAddr,ce.PublisherId,ce.PublishDate from ClassSpaceEnc ce where ce.ClassSpaceId = #{0} order by ce.EncOrder
